course_description: Axioms of probability, univariate and multivariate distributions, convergence of sequences of random variables, Markov chains, random processes, martingales. Prerequisite: BIOS 512 and BIOS 513.
sections: Class Nbr: 5218, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:50p, Instructor: Peng/Cui, Status: Open
